findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges, including changing tax and liquidity fee, maximum transaction amount, excluding from fee, minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity, marketing address, withdrawing BNBs, locking and unlocking. These privileges can be retaken even after ownership renouncement.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply respectively, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
